Class Event

java.lang.Object
logic.Event
public class Event extends Object
This class represents events, that will be stored in the Events class and can be called upon to get the appropriate data for each event
Version:
1.0
Author:
Logan Ouellette-Tran

  • Constructor Details

    • Event

      public Event(String question, List<String> options, int correctAnswer, int plusScore, int minusScore, String itemType, String item)
      Constructor for Event
      Parameters:
      question - event question
      options - List of options for possible answer to question
      correctAnswer - Index of correct answer in options
      plusScore - Score to be rewarded for correct answer
      minusScore - Score to be deducted for incorrect answer
      itemType - Item type to be rewarded for correct answer
      item - Item rewarded for correct answer
